channel.title: SharePoint on Mabster.NET
channel.description: Recent content in SharePoint on Mabster.NET

item.title: Get SharePoint Document Check-In Comment and ETag in Power Automate
item.description: When you’re building a Power Automate workflow that to approve files in SharePoint, you need the ETag property from the item, but you probably also want the “check-in comment” that the user enters when they click “Submit for Approval”. Here’s how to get both in one step!
